name: Twitter Night Mode (no bells or whistles)
description:
Basically changing background colors of twitter. No extra stuff like all the other ones.
I got super annoyed by all the borders on other styles so I did my best to remove all of them to make the theme as flat as possible.
If you see any problems please let me know.
additional_info:
You can find me on twitter at 
https://twitter.com/n8m8__
And if you like electronica you can check out my soundcloud 
https://soundcloud.com/n8-m8
